name: Borderlands 2: Game of the Year Edition
name_original: Borderlands 2: Game of the Year Edition
description:
Borderlands 2: Game of the Year Edition is an action, shooter and RPG game developed by Gearbox Software. It was originally released in 2013. 2K Games published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Borderlands 2: Game of the Year Edition is available on Linux, macOS, Xbox 360 and PC.
